message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you, considering the value you see in it. I believe this price reflects the quality and benefits of the product while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I see the value in this product, $9,500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. In light of this, I am pleased to offer the product to you at $8,750. This price still allows us to maintain a fair margin while providing you with a competitive deal. I hope this proposal works for you.
